text:
# Invite support

Tenant owner, service admins, and service support admins can submit a request
to MaivenPoint support team for guidance or troubleshooting.

Follow the steps below:

1\. Click the **Invite support** button on the upper-right corner next to your
account.

2\. Describe the issue and provide the contact information. You can upload a
diagnostic file that you think are relevant as attachment. Zip the files if
you have multiple files to attach.

3\. Click **Submit**. A technical support representative will reach out to you
as soon as possible.

# Invite support

Tenant owner, service admins, and service support admins can submit a request
to MaivenPoint support team for guidance or troubleshooting.

Follow the steps below:

1\. Click the **Invite support** button on the upper-right corner next to your
account.

2\. Describe the issue and provide the contact information. You can upload a
diagnostic file that you think are relevant as attachment. Zip the files if
you have multiple files to attach.

3\. Click **Submit**. A technical support representative will reach out to you
as soon as possible.
